release.description: This release of the Search User Interface is a component of the integrated release 3.0.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Search User Interface is a component of the integrated release 2.2.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Copied data-search interface as base for Search UI.
Changed data-search to point to new Search Service end point for search.
Removed the parent project's Release Notes document. This document now serves as the single source for this component's release changes.
